engChrName: S-Stay away! STAY AWAY!
engSearchText: S-Stay away! STAY AWAY!
jpnChrName: く、来るな！　来るなあああ──！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>く、来るな！　来るなあああ──！！

engChrName: Oh, my.
engSearchText: Oh, my.
jpnChrName: これは……！
jpnSearchText: これは……！

engChrName: This is not good! That man is being attacked!
engSearchText: This is not good! That man is being attacked!
jpnChrName: いかん、魔物に襲われておる！
jpnSearchText: いかん、魔物に襲われておる！

engChrName: Let's help him!
engSearchText: Let's help him!
jpnChrName: 早く行きましょう！
jpnSearchText: 早く行きましょう！

engChrName: Am I...going to die here...?
engSearchText: Am I...going to die here...?
jpnChrName: まさか……終わりなのか……？
jpnSearchText: まさか……終わりなのか……？

engChrName: Not if I can help it!
engSearchText: Not if I can help it!
jpnChrName: 立てるか！
jpnSearchText: 立てるか！

engChrName: Who are you people?!
engSearchText: Who are you people?!
jpnChrName: あんたたちは！？
jpnSearchText: あんたたちは！？

engChrName: We'll talk later. Stay back!
engSearchText: We'll talk later. Stay back!
jpnChrName: 話は後、下がっていなさい！
jpnSearchText: 話は後、下がっていなさい！

engChrName: O-Okay!
engSearchText: O-Okay!
jpnChrName: わ、分かった！
jpnSearchText: わ、分かった！

engChrName: Commencing counteroffensive!
engSearchText: Commencing counteroffensive!
jpnChrName: 迎撃を開始します！
jpnSearchText: 迎撃を開始します！

engChrName: Are you hurt at all?
engSearchText: Are you hurt at all?
jpnChrName: お怪我はありませんか？
jpnSearchText: お怪我はありませんか？

engChrName: No, I'm okay...
engSearchText: No, I'm okay...
jpnChrName: ああ、助かった……
jpnSearchText: ああ、助かった……

engChrName: Wait. No, I'm not! Please, help me!
engSearchText: Wait. No, I'm not! Please, help me!
jpnChrName: いやッ……！　頼む、助けてくれ！
jpnSearchText: いやッ……！　頼む、助けてくれ！

engChrName: Huh? But all the enemies are dead.
engSearchText: Huh? But all the enemies are dead.
jpnChrName: ？　既に周辺には敵性反応はありませんが？
jpnSearchText: ？　既に周辺には敵性反応はありませんが？

engChrName: Hold on a moment. Weren't there two tourists we needed to save?
engSearchText:
Hold on a moment. Weren't there two tourists we
needed to save?
jpnChrName: そういえば、もう一人は……？
jpnSearchText: そういえば、もう一人は……？

engChrName: My girlfriend's in danger! She's deeper in!
engSearchText: My girlfriend's in danger! She's deeper in!
jpnChrName: 俺の彼女が奥にいるんだ！
jpnSearchText: 俺の彼女が奥にいるんだ！

engChrName: Are you guys bracers? No, that doesn't matter! Whoever you are...just please save her!
engSearchText:
Are you guys bracers? No, that doesn't matter!
Whoever you are...just please save her!
jpnChrName: あんたらは遊撃士か？　いや誰でもいい── 彼女を助けてくれ！　頼む！！
jpnSearchText:
あんたらは遊撃士か？　いや誰でもいい──
彼女を助けてくれ！　頼む！！

engChrName: Don't tell me you abandoned her to save your own hide.
engSearchText:
Don't tell me you abandoned her to save your
own hide.
jpnChrName: ってお前、まさか彼女を置いて 一人で逃げ出したんじゃねえだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
ってお前、まさか彼女を置いて
一人で逃げ出したんじゃねえだろうな？

engChrName: Of course not! I was trying to save her!
engSearchText: Of course not! I was trying to save her!
jpnChrName: そんなことするわけないだろう！
jpnSearchText: そんなことするわけないだろう！

engChrName: We were just wandering around and minding our own business, and those things came from out of nowhere and attacked us!
engSearchText:
We were just wandering around and minding our
own business, and those things came from out of
nowhere and attacked us!
jpnChrName: 一緒にいた時にさっきのヤツに襲われて、 入口方面が塞がれたから──
jpnSearchText:
一緒にいた時にさっきのヤツに襲われて、
入口方面が塞がれたから──

engChrName: They had us cornered, so I used myself as bait to lure them away from her!
engSearchText:
They had us cornered, so I used myself as bait to lure
them away from her!
jpnChrName: 俺が囮になって彼女を奥に逃がしたんだ！
jpnSearchText: 俺が囮になって彼女を奥に逃がしたんだ！

engChrName: Wow. You've got some serious backbone.
engSearchText: Wow. You've got some serious backbone.
jpnChrName: へえ、ただの物好きなバカだと思ってたけど、 少しは骨があるようね。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、ただの物好きなバカだと思ってたけど、
少しは骨があるようね。

engChrName: All right. You head on back up to the surface and wait for us. We'll rescue your girl.
engSearchText:
All right. You head on back up to the surface and
wait for us. We'll rescue your girl.
jpnChrName: とにかくアンタは上に戻って待ってろ。 後は俺たちがなんとかする。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくアンタは上に戻って待ってろ。
後は俺たちがなんとかする。

engChrName: Y-You mean it?
engSearchText: Y-You mean it?
jpnChrName: ほ、本当か？
jpnSearchText: ほ、本当か？

engChrName: Of course. We'll take care of her.
engSearchText: Of course. We'll take care of her.
jpnChrName: 安心して任せるがいい。
jpnSearchText: 安心して任せるがいい。

engChrName: Th-Then I'll leave it to you! You're my only hope, so please rescue her!
engSearchText:
Th-Then I'll leave it to you! You're my only hope, so
please rescue her!
jpnChrName: な、なら……頼んだからな！
jpnSearchText: な、なら……頼んだからな！

engChrName: Now, let's go find her. I wouldn't be surprised if she was at the end.
engSearchText:
Now, let's go find her. I wouldn't be surprised if she
was at the end.
jpnChrName: では、わたしたちは奥に向かいましょうか。
jpnSearchText: では、わたしたちは奥に向かいましょうか。

engChrName: Bear in mind that the layout is identical to the other entrances, so both the left and right paths will take the same amount of time to traverse.
engSearchText:
Bear in mind that the layout is identical to the other
entrances, so both the left and right paths will take
the same amount of time to traverse.
jpnChrName: 構造が他の入口と同じなら どちらから進んでも変わらないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
構造が他の入口と同じなら
どちらから進んでも変わらないでしょう。

engChrName: I'm not sensing any monsters nearby, so we should be able to make a sprint for it.
engSearchText:
I'm not sensing any monsters nearby, so we should be
able to make a sprint for it.
jpnChrName: 今の所……近くに魔物の気配はなさそうだ。 奥まで駆け抜けるとすっか。
jpnSearchText:
今の所……近くに魔物の気配はなさそうだ。
奥まで駆け抜けるとすっか。

engChrName: There she is!
engSearchText: There she is!
jpnChrName: あれは……！
jpnSearchText: あれは……！

engChrName: Looks like these guys just did the saving for us.
engSearchText: Looks like these guys just did the saving for us.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ちょうど 魔物を片付け終わった所かよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ちょうど
魔物を片付け終わった所かよ。

engChrName: They must be one of the teams in the game—and I'm guessing this is their turf.
engSearchText:
They must be one of the teams in the game—and I'm
guessing this is their turf.
jpnChrName: てことはこいつらがここのチームか。
jpnSearchText: てことはこいつらがここのチームか。

engChrName: Careful. These guys are jaegers for sure. I've never seen them here in the Republic before, but I doubt they're good news.
engSearchText:
Careful. These guys are jaegers for sure. I've never
seen them here in the Republic before, but I doubt
they're good news.
jpnChrName: 気をつけてください、猟兵です。 共和国では見かけない団ですが、彼らは……
jpnSearchText:
気をつけてください、猟兵です。
共和国では見かけない団ですが、彼らは……

engChrName: Got it. So if they aren't Nidhoggr, they must be...
engSearchText: Got it. So if they aren't Nidhoggr, they must be...
jpnChrName: なるほど、《ニーズヘッグ》でもねえようだし、 つうことは――
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、《ニーズヘッグ》でもねえようだし、
つうことは――

engChrName: Hey. You guys are the Scorpions of Zahat, right?
engSearchText: Hey. You guys are the Scorpions of Zahat, right?
jpnChrName: アンタらが《ザハトの蠍》だな？
jpnSearchText: アンタらが《ザハトの蠍》だな？

engChrName: I take it you're one of the other participating teams?
engSearchText: I take it you're one of the other participating teams?
jpnChrName: その口ぶり、貴様らも“ゲーム”の参加者か？
jpnSearchText: その口ぶり、貴様らも“ゲーム”の参加者か？

engChrName: Yeah. Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: Yeah. Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: ああ、《アークライド解決事務所》のもんだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、《アークライド解決事務所》のもんだ。

engChrName: Wait... That's the name of the team that thrashed the head honcho of round one!
engSearchText:
Wait... That's the name of the team that thrashed the
head honcho of round one!
jpnChrName: あの担当者を倒したチーム……！
jpnSearchText: あの担当者を倒したチーム……！

engChrName: We may have been eliminated, but this is still our base of operations.
engSearchText:
We may have been eliminated, but this is still our
base of operations.
jpnChrName: 既に“ゲーム”から脱落したとは言え、 ここは俺たちザハトが拠点にしてる場所だ。
jpnSearchText:
既に“ゲーム”から脱落したとは言え、
ここは俺たちザハトが拠点にしてる場所だ。

engChrName: What business do you have here?
engSearchText: What business do you have here?
jpnChrName: 一体何の用だ？
jpnSearchText: 一体何の用だ？

engChrName: Nothing with you, but we do have business with the woman that's sprawled out on the floor.
engSearchText:
Nothing with you, but we do have business with the
woman that's sprawled out on the floor.
jpnChrName: 用があるのはアンタらじゃねえ、 そこの“彼女”だ。
jpnSearchText:
用があるのはアンタらじゃねえ、
そこの“彼女”だ。

engChrName: Don't tell me she's—
engSearchText: Don't tell me she's—
jpnChrName: 僕たちが捜してる観光客！ まさかッ……！！
jpnSearchText:
僕たちが捜してる観光客！
まさかッ……！！

engChrName: No, she is simply unconscious.
engSearchText: No, she is simply unconscious.
jpnChrName: いいえ、気を失っているだけのようです。
jpnSearchText: いいえ、気を失っているだけのようです。

engChrName: And what do you want with her?
engSearchText: And what do you want with her?
jpnChrName: そこの女か……
jpnSearchText: そこの女か……

engChrName: We're here to get her out of here. Mind handin' her over?
engSearchText:
We're here to get her out of here. Mind handin'
her over?
jpnChrName: その子はただの一般人だ。 悪いがこっちに引き渡してもらえないか？
jpnSearchText:
その子はただの一般人だ。
悪いがこっちに引き渡してもらえないか？

engChrName: I should've figured that's what you wanted.
engSearchText: I should've figured that's what you wanted.
jpnChrName: 一般人……やはりか。
jpnSearchText: 一般人……やはりか。

engChrName: Unfortunately, our answer is no.
engSearchText: Unfortunately, our answer is no.
jpnChrName: だが引き渡すのは無理な相談だ。
jpnSearchText: だが引き渡すのは無理な相談だ。

engChrName: B-But why?!
engSearchText: B-But why?!
jpnChrName: ど、どうしてダメなんですか……！
jpnSearchText: ど、どうしてダメなんですか……！

engChrName: Because she saw our faces.
engSearchText: Because she saw our faces.
jpnChrName: その女は俺たちの素顔を見た。
jpnSearchText: その女は俺たちの素顔を見た。

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?
jpnChrName: 見た？
jpnSearchText: 見た？

engChrName: We cannot allow civilians to bear witness to that.
engSearchText: We cannot allow civilians to bear witness to that.
jpnChrName: 一般人に素顔を知られるのは俺たちの禁忌。 だからその女には──
jpnSearchText:
一般人に素顔を知られるのは俺たちの禁忌。
だからその女には──

engChrName: That's why we have no choice but to make her disappear.
engSearchText:
That's why we have no choice but to make
her disappear.
jpnChrName: 消えてもらう。
jpnSearchText: 消えてもらう。

engChrName: So you're merely covering your tracks.
engSearchText: So you're merely covering your tracks.
jpnChrName: 口封じか。
jpnSearchText: 口封じか。

engChrName: But why go that far...?
engSearchText: But why go that far...?
jpnChrName: そんな……
jpnSearchText: そんな……

engChrName: You're planning to kill her just because she saw your faces? That's messed up—and we're NOT gonna let that happen!
engSearchText:
You're planning to kill her just because she saw
your faces? That's messed up—and we're NOT gonna
let that happen!
jpnChrName: 顔を見られただけでそんなこと…… 許されるはずがありません！
jpnSearchText:
顔を見られただけでそんなこと……
許されるはずがありません！

engChrName: Hmm? You look like you're a jaeger—and quite a young one, at that.
engSearchText:
Hmm? You look like you're a jaeger—and quite a
young one, at that.
jpnChrName: 小娘、貴様も猟兵のようだな。 だったら分かっているはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
小娘、貴様も猟兵のようだな。
だったら分かっているはずだ。

engChrName: In that case, let me educate you on something you should already understand:
engSearchText:
In that case, let me educate you on something you
should already understand:
jpnChrName: 猟兵団にはそれぞれの掟がある。 それがどんなものであれ──
jpnSearchText:
猟兵団にはそれぞれの掟がある。
それがどんなものであれ──

engChrName: Every corps has their own rules that they must abide by. That's what it means to be a jaeger.
engSearchText:
Every corps has their own rules that they must
abide by. That's what it means to be a jaeger.
jpnChrName: 他の団に口を出すべきではない。 それが猟兵の流儀だ。
jpnSearchText:
他の団に口を出すべきではない。
それが猟兵の流儀だ。

engChrName: If you cannot come to terms with that, then in my eyes, you are nothing more than an immature little girl.
engSearchText:
If you cannot come to terms with that, then in my
eyes, you are nothing more than an immature
little girl.
jpnChrName: それとも、そんなことすら 弁えないほどの未熟者なのか？
jpnSearchText:
それとも、そんなことすら
弁えないほどの未熟者なのか？

engChrName: Ngh...!
engSearchText: Ngh...!

engChrName: Shut the hell up, assholes.
engSearchText: Shut the hell up, assholes.
jpnChrName: そこまでにしてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText: そこまでにしてもらおうか。

engChrName: She might be a jaeger, but right now, she's an assistant at my office.
engSearchText:
She might be a jaeger, but right now, she's an
assistant at my office.
jpnChrName: 猟兵だろうと何だろうと、 今はうちの事務所の一員だ。
jpnSearchText:
猟兵だろうと何だろうと、
今はうちの事務所の一員だ。

engChrName: And I'm not gonna let you diss one of my employees like that.
engSearchText:
And I'm not gonna let you diss one of my employees
like that.
jpnChrName: だから、うちの流儀で行かせてもらう。
jpnSearchText: だから、うちの流儀で行かせてもらう。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: We're gonna play this thing by my rules. Here's how this is gonna go down...
engSearchText:
We're gonna play this thing by my rules. Here's how
this is gonna go down...
jpnChrName: ここは──
jpnSearchText: ここは──

engChrName: Lemme level with you. Killing her is just about the dumbest thing you could do in this situation.
engSearchText:
Lemme level with you. Killing her is just about the
dumbest thing you could do in this situation.
jpnChrName: よく考えた方がいい。 彼女を殺すのは決して賢い選択とは言えねえ。
jpnSearchText:
よく考えた方がいい。
彼女を殺すのは決して賢い選択とは言えねえ。

engChrName: Oh? And why's that?
engSearchText: Oh? And why's that?
jpnChrName: どういう意味だ。
jpnSearchText: どういう意味だ。

engChrName: It's possible that taking this girl's life could wind up leading to a rule violation.
engSearchText:
It's possible that taking this girl's life could wind up
leading to a rule violation.
jpnChrName: 忘れたのか？　ここはまだアルマータが 仕掛けた“ゲーム”の舞台だ。
jpnSearchText:
忘れたのか？　ここはまだアルマータが
仕掛けた“ゲーム”の舞台だ。

engChrName: I don't know about you, but some of us aren't ready to be called home to be with the Goddess.
engSearchText:
I don't know about you, but some of us aren't ready to
be called home to be with the Goddess.
jpnChrName: 民間人への干渉は“ルール違反”になる可能性がある。 そしたらみんな女神行きだ。
jpnSearchText:
民間人への干渉は“ルール違反”になる可能性がある。
そしたらみんな女神行きだ。

engChrName: Last I checked, the rules do not forbid the act of killing civilians—just leaking information to them.
engSearchText:
Last I checked, the rules do not forbid the act of
killing civilians—just leaking information to them.
jpnChrName: 禁じられたのは一般人への情報の漏洩だ。 殺すなとは言ってない。
jpnSearchText:
禁じられたのは一般人への情報の漏洩だ。
殺すなとは言ってない。

engChrName: True, but consider this:
engSearchText: True, but consider this:
jpnChrName: “可能性”の話だ。
jpnSearchText: “可能性”の話だ。

engChrName: What if someone reports that girl as missing?
engSearchText: What if someone reports that girl as missing?
jpnChrName: 一人の人間が消えたとなると、 それがきっかけになって──
jpnSearchText:
一人の人間が消えたとなると、
それがきっかけになって──

engChrName: It might arouse the curiosity of a journalist in search of a story or a police officer with a burning sense of justice.
engSearchText:
It might arouse the curiosity of a journalist in search
of a story or a police officer with a burning sense
of justice.
jpnChrName: “ゲーム”そのものが バレてしまうかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
“ゲーム”そのものが
バレてしまうかもしれない。

engChrName: They could end up blowin' this whole thing wide open—and also blow us up in the process.
engSearchText:
They could end up blowin' this whole thing wide
open—and also blow us up in the process.
jpnChrName: 物好きな記者や正義感有り余った 警察とかによってな。
jpnSearchText:
物好きな記者や正義感有り余った
警察とかによってな。

engChrName: I'd say it's best to play it safe and let her go.
engSearchText: I'd say it's best to play it safe and let her go.
jpnChrName: ここは慎重に行くべきじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText: ここは慎重に行くべきじゃねえのか？

engChrName: I think you're reaching.
engSearchText: I think you're reaching.
jpnChrName: ……ふん、屁理屈を。
jpnSearchText: ……ふん、屁理屈を。

engChrName: Oh, and there's another thing you ought to worry about.
engSearchText:
Oh, and there's another thing you ought to
worry about.
jpnChrName: それと、アンタらの地元で どうなのかは分からねえが……
jpnSearchText:
それと、アンタらの地元で
どうなのかは分からねえが……

engChrName: If you harm a hair on that girl's head, you're gonna have a giant target painted on your backs.
engSearchText:
If you harm a hair on that girl's head, you're gonna
have a giant target painted on your backs.
jpnChrName: こっちでは、民間人に危害が加えられたら ギルドが黙っちゃいないぜ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちでは、民間人に危害が加えられたら
ギルドが黙っちゃいないぜ。

engChrName: In case you didn't know, the Bracer Guild's in the business of protecting civilians.
engSearchText:
In case you didn't know, the Bracer Guild's in the
business of protecting civilians.
jpnChrName: そして何の因果か、俺たちはギルドと それなりに付き合いがある。
jpnSearchText:
そして何の因果か、俺たちはギルドと
それなりに付き合いがある。

engChrName: And we might just have to tip 'em off if you don't hand her over to us.
engSearchText:
And we might just have to tip 'em off if you don't
hand her over to us.
jpnChrName: このことがギルドに伝わったら…… アンタらにとっても結構まずいと思うが？
jpnSearchText:
このことがギルドに伝わったら……
アンタらにとっても結構まずいと思うが？

engChrName: Are you threatening us?!
engSearchText: Are you threatening us?!
jpnChrName: それは脅しのつもりか……！
jpnSearchText: それは脅しのつもりか……！

engChrName: Course not.
engSearchText: Course not.
jpnChrName: いやいやまさか。
jpnSearchText: いやいやまさか。

engChrName: But we are guild subcontractors, so we're obligated to report to 'em if something happens to her.
engSearchText:
But we are guild subcontractors, so we're obligated to
report to 'em if something happens to her.
jpnChrName: ただ俺たちはギルドの下請けのようなもんだから、 何かあったら報告する義務ってのがある。
jpnSearchText:
ただ俺たちはギルドの下請けのようなもんだから、
何かあったら報告する義務ってのがある。

engChrName: It's like you said earlier. You've got your rules you have to follow, and we've got ours, too.
engSearchText:
It's like you said earlier. You've got your rules you
have to follow, and we've got ours, too.
jpnChrName: 俺の裁量で隠せるもんじゃねえからな。
jpnSearchText: 俺の裁量で隠せるもんじゃねえからな。

engChrName: (Heh. Way to throw their words back in their stupid faces.)
engSearchText:
(Heh. Way to throw their words back in their
stupid faces.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、よく言うぜ。）
jpnSearchText: （ハッ、よく言うぜ。）

engChrName: (Look at him—whipping out the subcontractor bit only when it's convenient.)
engSearchText:
(Look at him—whipping out the subcontractor bit
only when it's convenient.)
jpnChrName: （随分と都合のいい“下請け”ね。）
jpnSearchText: （随分と都合のいい“下請け”ね。）

engChrName: If you ask me, you guys are puttin' your head in the lion's mouth.
engSearchText:
If you ask me, you guys are puttin' your head in the
lion's mouth.
jpnChrName: だからさ、こんな民間人一人のために 背負うリスクにしては割に合わねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
だからさ、こんな民間人一人のために
背負うリスクにしては割に合わねえだろ。

engChrName: I'm a nice guy, though, so I promise I won't snitch on you—if you give her over to us unharmed.
engSearchText:
I'm a nice guy, though, so I promise I won't snitch on
you—if you give her over to us unharmed.
jpnChrName: もし俺たちに預けてくれるなら、 見られたことも何とか誤魔化しておくぜ？
jpnSearchText:
もし俺たちに預けてくれるなら、
見られたことも何とか誤魔化しておくぜ？

engChrName: I can just report that she was found by a bunch of meatheads who were playin' airsoft. They'd probably buy that.
engSearchText:
I can just report that she was found by a bunch of
meatheads who were playin' airsoft. They'd probably
buy that.
jpnChrName: そうだな……アンタらのことは“サバゲ好きな連中” ってことにすれば納得するはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……アンタらのことは“サバゲ好きな連中”
ってことにすれば納得するはずだ。

engChrName: And I doubt she'd blab 'cause this place is supposed to be off limits.
engSearchText:
And I doubt she'd blab 'cause this place is supposed
to be off limits.
jpnChrName: あっちも立ち入り禁止の場所に入った 負い目がある、言いふらしたりはしねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
あっちも立ち入り禁止の場所に入った
負い目がある、言いふらしたりはしねえだろ。

engChrName: Plan's foolproof—and everyone wins. We get the girl, and you get outta this unscathed.
engSearchText:
Plan's foolproof—and everyone wins. We get the girl,
and you get outta this unscathed.
jpnChrName: これで、問題はねえよな？
jpnSearchText: これで、問題はねえよな？

engChrName: Very well.
engSearchText: Very well.
jpnChrName: 確かに貴様の話には一理ある。 断る理由もなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
確かに貴様の話には一理ある。
断る理由もなさそうだ。

engChrName: I don't see any reason to turn down your offer.
engSearchText: I don't see any reason to turn down your offer.
jpnChrName: その口車に乗ってやろう。
jpnSearchText: その口車に乗ってやろう。

engChrName: Great. Sounds like we've got a deal.
engSearchText: Great. Sounds like we've got a deal.
jpnChrName: おお、感謝するぜ。
jpnSearchText: おお、感謝するぜ。

engChrName: Now, then. We'll just take her with us and be on our way.
engSearchText:
Now, then. We'll just take her with us and be on
our way.
jpnChrName: これ以上ここにいても邪魔になるだけだ。 俺たちは退散させてもらうか。
jpnSearchText:
これ以上ここにいても邪魔になるだけだ。
俺たちは退散させてもらうか。

engChrName: We're gonna fight it out.
engSearchText: We're gonna fight it out.
jpnChrName: 一つ、勝負をしねえか？
jpnSearchText: 一つ、勝負をしねえか？

engChrName: ...You're challenging us?
engSearchText: ...You're challenging us?
jpnChrName: ……勝負だと？
jpnSearchText: ……勝負だと？

engChrName: Yeah. If we win, you hand her over to us.
engSearchText: Yeah. If we win, you hand her over to us.
jpnChrName: そこの女を賭けてな。 俺たちが勝ったら身柄を引き渡してもらう。
jpnSearchText:
そこの女を賭けてな。
俺たちが勝ったら身柄を引き渡してもらう。

engChrName: If you win, we'll back down.
engSearchText: If you win, we'll back down.
jpnChrName: 代わりにアンタらが勝ったら 俺たちは大人しく引き下がる。
jpnSearchText:
代わりにアンタらが勝ったら
俺たちは大人しく引き下がる。

engChrName: And of course, we won't say a word about this to anyone.
engSearchText:
And of course, we won't say a word about this
to anyone.
jpnChrName: 当然ここのことも言いふらしたりはしねえ。
jpnSearchText: 当然ここのことも言いふらしたりはしねえ。

engChrName: This doesn't benefit us in the slightest.
engSearchText: This doesn't benefit us in the slightest.
jpnChrName: こっちが勝った時のメリットが 少ないと思うが？
jpnSearchText:
こっちが勝った時のメリットが
少ないと思うが？

engChrName: Sure it does. It'll help kill the time.
engSearchText: Sure it does. It'll help kill the time.
jpnChrName: 付き合ってくれてもいいじゃねぇか、 どうせアンタらも暇でしょうがねえだろ？
jpnSearchText:
付き合ってくれてもいいじゃねぇか、
どうせアンタらも暇でしょうがねえだろ？

engChrName: It's not like you have anything else better to do, anyway. After all, you DID get eliminated from the get-go.
engSearchText:
It's not like you have anything else better to
do, anyway. After all, you DID get eliminated from
the get-go.
jpnChrName: 何せ初っ端から負けて “ゲーム”に脱落したんだから。
jpnSearchText:
何せ初っ端から負けて
“ゲーム”に脱落したんだから。

engChrName: You bastard! How dare you mock us!
engSearchText: You bastard! How dare you mock us!
jpnChrName: 貴様ぁ、俺たちザハトを愚弄する気か！！
jpnSearchText: 貴様ぁ、俺たちザハトを愚弄する気か！！

engChrName: (They took the bait.)
engSearchText: (They took the bait.)
jpnChrName: （やれやれ、見え透いた挑発にのっちゃって。）
jpnSearchText: （やれやれ、見え透いた挑発にのっちゃって。）

engChrName: (He really knows how to rile people up...)
engSearchText: (He really knows how to rile people up...)
jpnChrName: （ヴァンさんったら……）
jpnSearchText: （ヴァンさんったら……）

engChrName: We just got unlucky! If you went up against Marduk right from the start, you would've lost, too!
engSearchText:
We just got unlucky! If you went up against Marduk
right from the start, you would've lost, too!
jpnChrName: 確かにオレたちは負けたが、それは相手の マルドゥック社の強さが別格なだけだ！
jpnSearchText:
確かにオレたちは負けたが、それは相手の
マルドゥック社の強さが別格なだけだ！

engChrName: We would've kicked your asses if we ran into you instead!
engSearchText:
We would've kicked your asses if we ran into
you instead!
jpnChrName: そこいらの連中に後れを取るつもりはない！
jpnSearchText: そこいらの連中に後れを取るつもりはない！

engChrName: Them's fightin' words. Wanna prove it?
engSearchText: Them's fightin' words. Wanna prove it?
jpnChrName: だったら証明してもらおうか？
jpnSearchText: だったら証明してもらおうか？

engChrName: ...Fine. Your funeral, punk.
engSearchText: ...Fine. Your funeral, punk.
jpnChrName: ……いいだろう。 俺たちもこのまま帰るのが癪だからな。
jpnSearchText:
……いいだろう。
俺たちもこのまま帰るのが癪だからな。

engChrName: We'll return home with your head on a pike!
engSearchText: We'll return home with your head on a pike!
jpnChrName: 貴様の条件に乗ってやろう！
jpnSearchText: 貴様の条件に乗ってやろう！

engChrName: Yeah, don't think so.
engSearchText: Yeah, don't think so.
jpnChrName: そりゃどうも。
jpnSearchText: そりゃどうも。

engChrName: Bring it on, losers!
engSearchText: Bring it on, losers!
jpnChrName: ハッ、そう来なくっちゃな！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そう来なくっちゃな！

engChrName: Commencing battle with the Scorpions of Zahat!
engSearchText: Commencing battle with the Scorpions of Zahat!
jpnChrName: 敵集団《ザハトの蠍》──交戦を開始します！
jpnSearchText: 敵集団《ザハトの蠍》──交戦を開始します！

engChrName: Urgh... Maybe we...didn't really stand a chance in this game...
engSearchText:
Urgh... Maybe we...didn't really stand a chance in
this game...
jpnChrName: クッ……俺たちが一日目で脱落したのは 偶然ではなかったということか……
jpnSearchText:
クッ……俺たちが一日目で脱落したのは
偶然ではなかったということか……

engChrName: We should've brought more firepower!
engSearchText: We should've brought more firepower!
jpnChrName: もっと戦力を連れてくるべきだった……！
jpnSearchText: もっと戦力を連れてくるべきだった……！

engChrName: I feel for you guys. Goin' up against Marduk right at the start must've been tough.
engSearchText:
I feel for you guys. Goin' up against Marduk right at
the start must've been tough.
jpnChrName: さすがにいきなりマルドゥックと当たったのは 運が悪かったと思うがな。
jpnSearchText:
さすがにいきなりマルドゥックと当たったのは
運が悪かったと思うがな。

engChrName: This ain't your home turf, either. You guys got the raw end of the deal.
engSearchText:
This ain't your home turf, either. You guys got the
raw end of the deal.
jpnChrName: アンタらもホームグランドから遠い分、 色々とやりづらかっただろ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタらもホームグランドから遠い分、
色々とやりづらかっただろ。

engChrName: In any event, you won fair and square. The girl is yours.
engSearchText:
In any event, you won fair and square. The girl
is yours.
jpnChrName: ……約束は守る、女を連れて行け。
jpnSearchText: ……約束は守る、女を連れて行け。

engChrName: Cool.
engSearchText: Cool.
jpnChrName: そうさせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: そうさせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: We'll come up with a story to cover you guys.
engSearchText: We'll come up with a story to cover you guys.
jpnChrName: 一応アンタらのことは理由を付けて 誤魔化しておくから心配するな。
jpnSearchText:
一応アンタらのことは理由を付けて
誤魔化しておくから心配するな。

engChrName: ...Thank you.
engSearchText: ...Thank you.
jpnChrName: そうか……
jpnSearchText: そうか……
